Detailed Description

This class is a chunk item that has an attachment point.

It makes many calls through to the item that it has attached.

void ChunkAttachment::localBoundingBox ( BoundingBox &  bb,
bool  skinny = false 
) const [virtual]

This method retrieves a representative bounding box (in local coords) for this embodiment.

It is not a strict bounding box, but it's a good one for displaying or intersecting with or other similar operations.

Implements ChunkEmbodiment.

void ChunkAttachment::localVisibilityBox ( BoundingBox &  vbb,
bool  skinny = false 
) const [virtual]

This method retrieves a representative visibility box (in local coords) for this embodiment.

It is used to determine the visibility of the attachment.

void ChunkAttachment::move ( float  dTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called before tick to allow us a chance to move (which is not permitted during tick since we might change to a different chunk).

Reimplemented from ChunkDynamicEmbodiment.
